alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 14 at 3:07PM EDT until March 16 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing temperatures as low as the upper 20s expected. * WHERE...In Georgia, Jenkins, Screven and Bulloch Counties. In South Carolina, Allendale, Hampton, Inland Colleton, Dorchester and Inland Berkeley Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Wednesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton
